name: Realistic Sniper Impact
description: Makes ragdoll effects from sniper hits more realistic, headshots no longer cause backflips.

options.name: Magnum Pistols
options.tooltip: Remove artificial upwards lift applied to El Matador and Striker pistols as well. They still retain their knockback.

options.name: Sniper Assassin - Remove Upkick
options.tooltip: Remove artificial upwards lift applied to Sniper Assassin rifles. They still retain their knockback.

options.name: Sniper Assassin - Reduced Impact Force
options.tooltip: Lessens the knockback of Sniper Assassin rifles to a more realistic amount. WARNING: THIS MAKES SNIPER ASSASSIN QUITE HARD!
